table.name: application
table.remarks: Applications capture details and manage requests received by the land administration agency to change, update or report on land registry and/or cadastre information. Applications have a lifecycle and transition into different states as the land administration agency processes the request that instigated the application. The primary role of an application is to implement case management functionality in SOLA. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the application.

column.name: nr
column.remarks: The application number displayed to end users. Generated by the generate-application-nr business rule when the application record is initially saved.

column.name: agent_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the party (individual or organization) that is requesting information or changes to the land registry and/or cadastre information recorded in SOLA. This could be a lawyer or surveyor under instruction from the property owner, the property owner themselves or a third party with a vested interest in a particular property.

column.name: contact_person_id
column.remarks: The person to contact in regard to the application. This person is considered the applicant.

column.name: lodging_datetime
column.remarks: The lodging date and time of the application. This date identifies when the application is officially accepted by the land administration agency.

column.name: expected_completion_date
column.remarks: The date the application should be completed by. This value is determined from the maximum service expected completion date associated with the application.

column.name: assignee_id
column.remarks: The identifier of the user assigned to the application. If this value is null, then the application is unassigned.

column.name: assigned_datetime
column.remarks: The date and time the application was last assigned to a user.

column.name: location
column.remarks: The approximate geographic location of the application. The user may indicate more than one point if the application affects a large number of parcels.

column.name: services_fee
column.remarks: The sum of all service fees.

column.name: tax
column.remarks: The tax applicable based on the services fee.

column.name: total_fee
column.remarks: The sum of the services_fee and tax.

column.name: total_amount_paid
column.remarks: The amount paid by the applicant. Usually will be the full amount (total_fee), but can be a partial payment if the land administration agency accepts partial payments.

column.name: fee_paid
column.remarks: Flag to indicate a sufficient amount (or all) of the fee has been paid. Once set, the application can be assigned and worked on.

column.name: action_code
column.remarks: The last action that happended to the application. E.g. lodged, assigned, validated, approved, etc.

column.name: action_notes
column.remarks: Optional description of the action.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: The status of the application.

column.name: receipt_reference
column.remarks: The number of the receipt issued as proof of payment. If more than one receipt is issued in the case of part payments, the receipts numbers can be listed in this feild separated by commas.

column.name: description
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: A summary description for the SL Job

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this Application/Job. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this Application/Job. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the application_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: application_action_type
table.remarks: Code list of action types. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the application action type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the application action type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the application action type

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the application action type.

table.name: application_property
table.remarks: Captures details of property associated to an application. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the application property.

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the application the record is associated to.

column.name: name_firstpart
column.remarks: The first part of the name or reference assigned by the land administration agency to identify the property.

column.name: name_lastpart
column.remarks: The remaining part of the name or reference assigned by the land administration agency to identify the property.

column.name: area
column.remarks: The area of the property. This value should be square meters and converted if required for display to the user. e.g. Converted on display into and imperial acres, roods and perches value.

column.name: total_value
column.remarks: The land or property value (may vary from jurisdiction to jurisdiction) on which a proportionate service fee can be calculated.

column.name: verified_exists
column.remarks: Flag to indicate if the property details provided for the application match an existing property record in the BA Unit table.

column.name: verified_location
column.remarks: Flag to indicate if the property details provided for the application reference an existing parcel record in the Cadastre Object table.

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Reference to a record in the BA Unit table that matches the property details provided for the application.

column.name: land_use_code
column.remarks: Code to indicate the general purpose of the property. E.g. Commerical, Residential, Industrial, etc.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the application_property_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: application_spatial_unit
table.remarks: Captures details of parcels (a.k.a. Cadastre Objects or Spatial Units) associated to an application. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the application the record is associated to.

column.name: spatial_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the parcel (a.k.a Cadastre Objects or Spatial Units) associated to the application.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the application_spatial_unit_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: application_status_type
table.remarks: Code list of application status types. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the application status type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the application status type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the application status type

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the application status type.

table.name: application_uses_source
table.remarks: Links the application to the sources (a.k.a. documents) submitted with the application. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the application the record is associated to.

column.name: source_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the source associated to the application.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the application_spatial_unit_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: authority
table.remarks: Code list of authorities that can assist in the resolution of a dispute or objection. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the authority.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the authority.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the authority.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the authority (c - current, x - no longer valid).

table.name: checklist_group
table.remarks: Indicates a group of checklist items that should be applied to various transaction types. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the checklist item group.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the checklist item group.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the checklist item group.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the checklist item group.

table.name: checklist_item
table.remarks: An item that must be checked and confirmed before the application can proceed. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the checklist item.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the checklist item.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the checklist item.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the checklist item.

column.name: display_order
column.remarks: The relative display order for the checklist item.

table.name: checklist_item_in_group
table.remarks: Identifies the checklist items within each checklist group. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: checklist_group_code
column.remarks: The code for the checklist group.

column.name: checklist_item_code
column.remarks: Code of the checklist item related to the checklist group.

table.name: Function: get_concatenated_name
table.remarks: Returns a concatenated list of all cadastre objects associated to the BA Unit referenced by the application.

table.name: Function: get_work_summary
table.remarks: Returns a summary of the services processed for a specified reporting period. Used by the Lodgement Statistics Report.

table.name: Function: getlodgement
table.remarks: Not used. Replaced by get_work_summary.

table.name: Function: getlodgetiming
table.remarks: Not used. Replaced by get_work_summary.

table.name: negotiate
table.remarks: Summarizes details of the negotiation between the state and the landholder in relation to a property being acquired or disposed by the state. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the notification.

column.name: service_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the service.

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the ba_unit (a.k.a. property).

column.name: initial_amount
column.remarks: The initial amount offered for the property to start the negotiation. Usually set based on valuations that have been undertaken.

column.name: final_amount
column.remarks: The final amount resulting from the negotiation.

column.name: notification_date
column.remarks: The date the land holder is notified of the initial offer and negotiation begins. This date can be used to calculate when the offer expires or when responses are required, etc.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: The type of negotiation. One of Open or Compulsory, etc.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: The status of the negotiation. Indicates the stage of the negotiation process. One of Pending, Presented, Negotiating, Rejected, Withdrawn, Agreed, Completed, etc.

column.name: description
column.remarks: General details related to the negotiation such as a summary of any specific conditions, etc.

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this Negotiation. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this Negotiation. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the negotiate_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: negotiate_status
table.remarks: Code list identifying the status of the negotiation between the parties involved. e.g. Pending, Presented, Negotiating, Rejected, Withdrawn, Agreed, Completed Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the negotiation status.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the negotiation status.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the negotiation status.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the negotiation status (c - current, x - no longer valid).

table.name: negotiate_type
table.remarks: Code list identifying the possible types of negotiation that may occur between landholders and the state. e.g. Compulsory, Open Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the negotiation type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the negotiation type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the negotiation type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the negotiation type (c - current, x - no longer valid).

table.name: negotiate_uses_source
table.remarks: Links sources (a.k.a. documents) to the applicable negotiation records. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: negotiate_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the negotiation the record is associated to.

column.name: source_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the source associated to the negotiation.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the negotiate_uses_source table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: notify
table.remarks: Identifies parties to be notified in bulk as well as the relationship the party has with the land affected by the job. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the notification.

column.name: service_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the service.

column.name: party_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the party.

column.name: relationship_type_code
column.remarks: The type of relationship between the party and the land affected by the job. One of Owner, Adjoining Owner, Occupier, Adjoining Occupier, Rightholder, Other, etc.

column.name: description
column.remarks: The description of the party to notify.

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this Notification Party. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this Notification Party. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the notify_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: notify_property
table.remarks: Identifies the properties (a.k.a. Ba Units) this notification party is related to. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: notify_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the notification party the record is associated to.

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the property associated to the objection.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the notify_property_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: notify_relationship_type
table.remarks: Code list identifying the type of relationship a party has with land affected by a job. Used for bulk notification purposes. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the relationship type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the relationship type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the relationship type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the relationship type (c - current, x - no longer valid).

table.name: notify_uses_source
table.remarks: Links the notification parties to the sources (a.k.a. documents) genreated for the bulk notification. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: notify_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the notification party the record is associated to.

column.name: source_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the source associated to the application.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the objection_uses_source_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: objection
table.remarks: Identifies details of an objection raised by parties affected by the activities of the state in relation to land. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the objection.

column.name: service_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the service.

column.name: nr
column.remarks: The reference number assigned to the objection by the user

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: The status code for the objection. One of Lodged, Open, Resolved, Closed, Appeal or Withdrawn, etc.

column.name: lodged_date
column.remarks: Date indicating when the objection was first lodged with the state.

column.name: resolution_date
column.remarks: Date indicating when the objection was resolved.

column.name: description
column.remarks: The description for the objection. Entered by the user.

column.name: resolution
column.remarks: Description of the resolution for the objection along with any notes on how the resolution will be enforced.

column.name: authority_code
column.remarks: The authority that is assisting to resolve the dispute. Can be Mediator, Court, Tribunal, etc.

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this Objection. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this Objection. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the objection_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: objection_comment
table.remarks: Describes actions that have occurred in relation to this objection such as court filings, court appearance dates, etc. Intended to provide a history of actions related to dealing with this objection. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the objection comment.

column.name: objection_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the objection the comment relates to.

column.name: username
column.remarks: The username of the user that entered the comment.

column.name: comment_date
column.remarks: The date applicable for the comment such as the date entered or the date the comment applies from.

column.name: comment
column.remarks: The comment relating to the objection.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the objection_comment_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: party_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the party associated to the objection.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: objection_property
table.remarks: Identifies the properties (a.k.a. Ba Units) this objection is in relation to. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: objection_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the objection the record is associated to.

column.name: ba_unit_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the property associated to the objection.

column.name: change_user

column.name: change_time

table.remarks: Code list of objection status Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: description

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the objection status (c - current, x - no longer valid).

table.name: objection_uses_source
table.remarks: Links the objections to the sources (a.k.a. documents) submitted with the objection. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: objection_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the objection the record is associated to.

column.name: source_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the source associated to the application.

column.name: rowidentifier

table.name: public_display_item
table.remarks: Indicates if the checklist items applicable to a service are satisified as well as any comments from the user. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the public display item.

column.name: service_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the service.

column.name: nr
column.remarks: The reference number assigned to the public display item by the user

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: The type of public display item. One of Public Display Map, Gazette Notice, Newspaper, etc.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: The status code for the public display item. One of Being Prepared, On Display or Completed, Withdrawn, etc.

column.name: display_from
column.remarks: Optional date indicating when the item is (or was) going to be on display from

column.name: display_to
column.remarks: Optional date indicating when the item is (or was) going to be on display to

column.name: description
column.remarks: The description for the public display item. Entered by the user.

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this Application/Job. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this Application/Job. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the public_display_item_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: public_display_item_uses_source
table.remarks: Links the public display items to the sources (a.k.a. documents) submitted with the application. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: public_display_item_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the public display item the record is associated to.

column.name: source_id
column.remarks: Identifier of the source associated to the application.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the public_display_item_uses_source_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: public_display_status
table.remarks: Code list of public display statuses Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the public display status.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the public display status.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the public display status.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the public display status.

table.name: public_display_type
table.remarks: Code list of public display types Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the public display type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the public display type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the public display type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the public display type.

table.name: request_category_type
table.remarks: Code list of request category types. Request category types group the request types into logical groupings such as request types for registration or cadastral changes. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the request category type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the request category type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the request category type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the request category type

table.name: request_display_group
table.remarks: Code list identifying the display groups that can be used for request types Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the request display group.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the request display group.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the request display group.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the negotiation type (c - current, x - no longer valid).

table.name: request_type
table.remarks: Code list of request types. Request types identify the different types of services provided by the land administration agency. SOLA includes a default set of request types that can be reconfigured to match those required by the land administration agency. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the request type.

column.name: request_category_code
column.remarks: The code for the request category type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the request type.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the request type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the request type

column.name: nr_days_to_complete
column.remarks: The number of days it should take for the service to be completed. Can be used to manage and monitor transaction throughput targets for the land administration agency.

column.name: base_fee
column.remarks: The fixed fee component charged for the service or 0 if there is no fixed fee.

column.name: area_base_fee
column.remarks: The fee component charged for each square metre of the property or 0 if no area fee applies.

column.name: value_base_fee
column.remarks: The fee component charged against the value of the property or 0 if no value fee applies.

column.name: nr_properties_required
column.remarks: The minimum number of properties that must be referenced by the application before services of this type can be processed.

column.name: notation_template
column.remarks: Template text to use when completing the details of RRR records created by the service.

column.name: rrr_type_code
column.remarks: Used by the Property Details screen to identify the type of RRR affected by the service. If null, the Property Details screen will allow the user to process all RRR types.

column.name: type_action_code
column.remarks: Used by teh Property Details screen to identify what action applies to the RRR affected by the service. One of new, vary or cancel. If null, the Property Details screen will allow the user to create or vary RRRs matching the rrr_type_code.

column.name: service_panel_code
column.remarks: SOLA Extension. Used to identify the SOLA panel class to display to the user when they start the service

table.name: request_type_requires_source_type
table.remarks: Identifies the types of sources (a.k.a. documents) that must be provided before a service can be processed by the land administration agency. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension

column.name: source_type_code
column.remarks: The source type required by the request type.

column.name: request_type_code
column.remarks: The request type that requries the source to be present on the application.

table.name: Sequence: application_nr_seq
table.remarks: Sequence number used as the basis for the Application nr field. This sequence is used by the generate-application-nr business rule.

table.name: service
table.remarks: Used to control the type of change an application can make to the land registry and/or cadastre information recorded in SOLA. Services broadly identify the actions the land administration agency will undertake for the application. Every application lodged in SOLA must include at least one service. SOLA includes a default set of request types that can be reconfigured to match those services required by the land administration agency. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the service.

column.name: application_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the application the service is associated with.

column.name: request_type_code
column.remarks: The request type identifying the purpose of the service.

column.name: service_order
column.remarks: The relative order of the service within the application. Can be used to imply a workflow sequence for application related tasks.

column.name: lodging_datetime
column.remarks: The date the service was lodged on the application. Typically will match the application lodgement_datetime, but may vary if a service is added after the application is lodged.

column.name: expected_completion_date
column.remarks: Date when the service is expected to be completed by. Calculated using the service lodging_datetime and the nr_days_to_complete for the service request type.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: Service status code.

column.name: action_code
column.remarks: Service action code. Indicates the last action to occur on the service. E.g. lodge, start, complete, cancel, etc.

column.name: action_notes
column.remarks: Provides extra detail related to the last action to occur on the service. Not Used.

column.name: base_fee
column.remarks: The fixed fee charged for the service. Obtained from the base_fee value in request_type.

column.name: area_fee
column.remarks: The area fee charged for the service. Calculated from the sum of all areas listed for properties on the application multiplied by the request_type.area_base_fee.

column.name: value_fee
column.remarks: The value fee charged for the service. Calculated from the sum of all values listed for properties on the application multiplied by the request_type.value_base_fee.

table.name: service_action_type
table.remarks: Code list of service action types. Service actions identify the actions user can perform against services. E.g. lodge, start, revert, cancel, complete. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the service action type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the service action type.

column.name: status_to_set
column.remarks: The status to set on the service when the service action is applied.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the service action type

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the service action type.

table.name: service_checklist_item
table.remarks: Indicates if the checklist items applicable to a service are satisified as well as any comments from the user. Tags: SOLA State Land Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the service checklist item.

column.name: service_id
column.remarks: Identifier for the service.

column.name: checklist_item_code
column.remarks: Code of the checklist item. If null, then the service checklist item is a custom item created by the user.

column.name: name
column.remarks: The name or title for the checklist item. Entered by the user for a custom item.

column.name: description
column.remarks: The description for the checklist item. Entered by the user for a custom item.

column.name: result
column.remarks: Flag indicating if the checklist item passed (t), failed (f) or is not applicable (null)

column.name: comment
column.remarks: Comment entered by the user to clarify why the checklist item passed, failed or is not applicable.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the service_checklist_item_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: service_status_type
table.remarks: Code list of service status types. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the service status type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the service status type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the service status type

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the service status type.

table.name: systematic_registration_certificates
table.remarks: Used by systematic registration to identify parcels that require a certificate to be generated.

table.name: type_action
table.remarks: Code list of request type actions. Identifies what actions the Property Details screen should support for RRRs when processing a service. One of new, vary or cancel. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Reference Table

column.name: code
column.remarks: The code for the request type action.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: Displayed value of the request type action.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the request type action.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Status of the request type action.
